title: Culturally Adaptive Instructional Design Strategies in Multicultural Educational Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental multicultural education concepts and practical teaching experience
context.additional_context: Practical instructional design competency development course for multicultural workplace practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social relationship-building methods of multicultural learners and incorporate them into instructional design.
Learners can develop instructional materials considering cultural differences in cognitive and learning styles.
Learners can establish flexible instructional strategies that reflect temporal perception differences.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
